product.name: camera
product.description: device for recording an image of an object on a light-sensitive surface

product.name: speaker
product.description: the electromagnetic wave that converts electromagnetic waves into sound waves

product.name: mike
product.description: a device that is used to make sounds louder or to record them on a tape recorder

product.name: screen
product.description: is the flat vertical surface on which pictures or words are shown in a cinema.
